src.avi package¶

Submodules¶

src.avi.base module¶

class src.avi.base.BaseMesh(name: str, vertices: list, faces: list, uvs: list)¶

Bases: object

Prototypes behaviour for default mesh instantiation into Blender.

add_uvs(ob)¶

Generates uv coordinates to mesh object.

Parameters

() (ob) – A bpy object without a uv map or uv coordinates.

to_mesh(collection=None)¶

Generates a mesh using raw vertex, face, and uv data.

Parameters

() (collection) – A bpy collection in the scene to contain the mesh.

src.avi.proxy module¶

class src.avi.proxy.Proxy(name: str, file_path)¶

Bases: src.avi.base.BaseMesh

Constructs mesh by fetching binary pickle data.

src.avi.proxy_group module¶

class src.avi.proxy_group.ProxyGroup(proxies)¶

Bases: object

Constructs multiple meshes under a single collection.

to_mesh(collection_name: str)¶

Generates each mesh contained in the group.

Parameters

collection_name (str) – A string representing the containing collection.
